sourcesContent:
import { useDispatch, useSelector } from "react-redux" import { Link } from "react-router-dom" import Navbar from "./../Components/Navbar" const PlaceOrderScreen = () => { const dispatch = useDispatch() const cart = useSelector(state => state.cart) const userLogin = useSelector(state => state.userLogin) const { cartItems, shippingAddress, paymentMethod } = cart const { userInfo } = userLogin const orderItemsElements = cartItems.map(item => { return (

{item.name}

QUANTITY: {item.quantity}

SUBTOTAL: ${item.price}

) }) return ( <>

Customer

{userInfo.name}

{userInfo.email}

Order info

Shipping: {shippingAddress.city}

Payment: {paymentMethod}

Deliver to

Address: {shippingAddress.address}

{orderItemsElements}

Products

$345

Shipping

$123

Tax

$5

Total

$5678

) } export default PlaceOrderScreen
